comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I remember divers working in the Limerick Docks up until the early 70's!  One could see their suits hanging up to dry outside their room near the clock tower and their helmets and equipment were stored there.  Beautiful objects in shining brass and bronze with tiny glass inserts.  I am open to correction but I suspect that this is taken near the "floating Docks" in Limerick harbour with the gate to either that dock or the dry dock in the background.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Lovely, was hoping someone would know. With any more confirmation, I'll be able to add this photo to the map...
